teaser: First up, Chester Wisniewski, security expert at the cybersecurity firm Sophos, joins us to talk about cultural changes that need to happen within the security and technology industries to better protect consumer data. Plus, we take a look at what’s driving the increasing popularity of salsa music. Salsa digital downloads rose 14 percent in 2013 compared to 7 percent for the overall market. Could the Latin market single-handedly save the languishing music industry?
